answers.author: Jared Dailey
answers.text:
Colin:
According to ICMA's form of government statistics (2012), there are 414 cities that operate under the council-manager form of government.  You can review other population ranges in the attached document.  Hope this helps.


Colin:

According to ICMA's form of government statistics (2012), there are 414 cities that operate under the council-manager form of government.  You can review other population ranges in the attached document.  Hope this helps.

answers.author: Kimberly Nelson
answers.text:
Using 2010 Census population, the number is 460.  The Municipal Yearbook has some errors.  My dataset also has a higher number of municipalities than ICMA (I include towns and townships that operate as municipalities).

author: Colin Baenziger
text: Does anyone know how many cities in the US with Populations over 50,000 have the City Manager form of govenrment?
title: How many cities in the US with Populations over 50,000 have the City Manager form of govenrment?
